reviews.review: chuj

Gra ma świetny pomysł, jednak wykonanie i nastawienie społeczności do gry pozostawia troszkę do życzenia. Po pierwsze jest to zbugowana gra, w której często wyjdziesz z powodu "mocnego zdenerwowania" (np. Flashlight bug, który to blokuje możliwość widzenia czegokolwiek na cały mecz). Warto przy wyborze gry multi spojrzeć na zachowanie społeczności, które jest... strasznie mieszane. W jednym meczu możesz trafić na ludzi chcących po prostu przyjemnie spędzić czas, należych ich za to szanować. Jednak każdy kij ma dwa końce, nie raz chce się wyjść z meczu, gdyż ktoś pokazuje zabójcy naszą kryjówkę, albo daje nam umrzeć tuż przed nim. Z kolei dla zabójcy, którego survy powinny się raczej bać, utrapieniem są ludzie, którzy ganiają się z nim po całej mapie, śmiejąc się z niego, a gdy ich złapie i typowo ze złości przykampi, w lobby wyzywają od najgorszych .... . Podsumowując to warto zagrać i polecić innym, jednak zabawa tak naprawdę zależy od grupy, na jaką się natrafi. Nie bójmy się wyjść z gry, która nas nie bawi. (Nie spodziewajcie się ciepłych i uczuciowych przeprosin za błędy gry, tylko bana na określony czas, za to iż wyszliście z powodu ich niedopracowania)

Es un juego muy entretenido, a pesar de todo el tiempo que llevo jugando aun siento la tensión de tener al asesino cerca, con o sin amigos es una experiencia que se disfruta bastante, aún hay gente jugándolo, a veces tarda un poco en encontrar partida pero siempre encuentra. Como en todo juego siempre exitirá la persona que quiere arruinarle el juego a los demás, tal vez debería existir mas reproche en cuanto a los reportes hacia otros jugadores.

Although this game has its issues, it is one of the most addictive games i have in my library. The mechanics of the game are fairly simple, yet effective, and despite having only one main game mode every game is different and unique. I would recommend this game to anyone who enjoys skill based games. 9/10

EDIT: This is the worst game ever made in the history of mankind, the mechanics are not effective the game is broken in every conceivable way and as such are not at all simple, the only thing that can be described as simple are the devs of this insanely shit game. There is 0 skill involved it is all luck and every game is the same, utter dog shit. 0.001/10

You want an honest review? I dislike this game a lot. I enjoy playing it, (sometimes), but the balance is broken, the community is HORRID. Bans aren't given out often and if they are they're usually unfairly handed out. The characters are cool, (some, looking at you QUENTIN). But here's the thing, every new update that comes out doesn't fix the problem we've had since launch. The game is survivor sided. I always hear a clash between two sides. I've been rank one on both throughout the years between two accounts. The emblem system is stupid, it causes so much unnecessary pressure onto killers. One mistake made by the killer and the game is over. Survivors can make mistakes over, and over, and over, and not get punished. You mess up your T-Wall loop? No problem, jungle gym there, oh you messed that up? That's okay, there's a haybale loop, oh you messed that up too!? There's shack. It's never ending. Survivors have way too much stacked against them. There are times where killers have to intentionally let survivors go so they can rank up after slugging all 4. In most games, killers have no outplays. Survivors can run 4 dstrike (cancelling pop farming), 4 prove thyself (can literally do all 5 gens in under 5 minutes), or my favourite, unbreakable, where the only pressure killers used to have in the game by slugging, is completely cancelled out by unbreakable. This doesn't even account for the other broken strategies. Like inner strength and d strike, or tenacity and unbreakable. Killers have some broken perks, like BBQ, Spirit Fury, but they all get nerfed eventually. Spirit Fury is cancelled by throwing pallets early, BBQ is countered by lockers, Distortion. Enduring can't stop D-Strike stun anymore. The game is WAY too survivor sided. The Game, Hawkins, Haddonfield, etc. And don't forget that balanced landing can still create infinites, WOOOO!

Other than the fact that it frequently disconnects, the matchmaking is terribly rage inducing, and the majority of players are extremely toxic.  I really enjoy playing this game, its full of thrill and challenge, and if you enjoy the occasional really tough, heartbeat raising, scary, fun to play with friends game.  This game is a lot of fun and there is a lot of variety.  You will absolutely hate it, but its addicting and fun to play around with!

Disclaimer: while writing this I have 48 hours so my opinions may not be rock solid.
It's got a solid structure for the game, but balancing asymmetrical team games can be hard. Depending on the rank you may see shifts in which side the game is favored toward. Also, many characters are locked behind a paywall with no free way to unlock them. I'm still going to play the game because it can be fun, but I think changes need to be made.

Después de tantas horas jugadas puedo decir que es un buen juego, pero al cabo de un tiempo se vuelve muy, pero MUY repetitivo siendo superviviente, ya que literalmente es siempre lo mismo con las mismas habilidades y mecánicas, (aunque cada superviviente tiene sus propias habilidades pasivas, pero después uno les pone las de siempre). Por su parte siendo asesino es mas divertido, ya que cada personaje tiene habilidades propias que ningún otro personaje tiene, aparte de las pasivas, que como pasa jugando con superviviente, uno al cabo de un tiempo se pone las de siempre. En general es un buen juego, pero a mi gusto se vuelve bastante repetitivo, pero igualmente recomendado.

This game requires a really high skill level. If you know nothing about the game you are going to get destroyed no matter if you are the killer or survivor. Even if you do know a little bit about the game its really hard to be decent. They reset players ranks every month so there really isn't a time when you get to play with people who are actually at your level. They for some reason keep buffing killers and giving them one shot abilities so it really makes the games fast and uninteresting. And even if you want to be a killer main you will get stuck with 5-10 que times so you spend a lot of time just sitting and waiting only to play a 5min game. I find myself feeling frustrated more than anything when playing this game. For how long this game has been out it's crazy they cant balance anything. Only time I have fun with this game is when I play with friends but playing by yourself gets old real quick.
